author: cnbc.com
title: Murray Resources Named Grand-Prize Winner in the 2018 Best Staffing Firms to Work For List by Staffing Industry Analysts
text:
HOUSTON, March 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Murray Resources, a leading Houston recruiting firm, has been named the Grand Prize winner in the 21-50 employee category by Staffing Industry Analysts (SIA) in their annual list of Best Staffing Firms to Work For. SIA is a global advisor on staffing and contingent workforce solutions. The organization's Best Staffing Firms to Work For award recognizes employers who create an engaging and supportive work environment. Winners were recognized at the 27 th annual SIA Executive Forum North America, held in Miami Beach, Florida.
Murray Resources President, Marsha Murray, attended the Executive Forum and accepted the award on the company's behalf. Ms. Murray remarked, "We're proud of everything our team accomplishes and all the great work they do for our clients and candidates, but knowing that they enjoy coming to work every day gives me more joy than any metric or financial accomplishment we could achieve. It's an honor to accept this award on behalf of our team and we're committed to continuing to provide the very best work environment we can."
This year 208 staffing firms participated in the program, which was conducted by SIA in collaboration with Quantum Workplace. Internal employees were asked to complete a comprehensive questionnaire and winners were based on the company's overall composite score.
"The winners on this year's Best Staffing Firms to Work For list are committed to creating an environment that helps their workers reach their potential, professionally and personally," said Subadhra Sriram, editor and publisher, media products, at SIA.
About Murray Resources
Founded in 1988, Murray Resources is a leading Houston recruiting firm and staffing agency. The company serves a base of over 800 client companies, including numerous Fortuneâ„¢ 1000 companies and high-growth small and medium-sized organizations, in the areas of administrative, accounting, customer service, engineering, finance, human resources, IT / technology, light industrial, management / leadership, manufacturing, marketing, operations, and sales. Murray Resources' 95% Performance Evaluation Score represents one of the highest placement satisfaction rates in the industry. The company is a multiple-time winner of the "Best Places to Work" award by the Houston Business Journal, Inc. 500/5000 Fastest Growing Companies in the U.S., and has been recognized as one of the largest recruiting firms in Houston by the Houston Business Journal.
For more information, visit www.murrayresources.com .
